text:
I cannot get direcotry listing on. Can't find it in the CONF file. Please 
directme to where it is and how to turn it on.

Cody

This is answered in the FAQ (apache 1.3 docs) and is a support question in any case
not a bug report, so it does not belong here.
creator: slive@apache.org
